MC_ReadStatus_SML (FB)
MC_ReadStatus_SML (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_ReadStatus_SML
Returns the axis state according to the PLCopen the state diagram for a given axis.
InOut:

Comment

expected
